custom-block.s: カメラの位置を %n %n %n にする
カメラの向きを %n %n %n （地点） に向ける
%s の色を RGB %n %n %n にする

block.l: //キャンバスをテクスチャとする例２ var cvs = document.createElement('canvas'), ctx = cvs.getContext('2d'); cvs.width = 256; cvs.height = 256; // 画像を用意する var img = new Image(); img.src = "assets/textures/earth_atmos_2048.jpg"; img.onload = function(){ ctx.drawImage(img, 160, 0, 256, 256, 0, 0, 256, 256); ctx.beginPath(); ctx.rect(20, 40, 100, 100); ctx.fillStyle = "#FF0000"; ctx.fill(); ctx.closePath(); // Textureとして指定する．以下Three.jsでよくあるオブジェクト描画と同じ var texture = new THREE.Texture(cvs); texture.needsUpdate = true; var material = new THREE.MeshPhongMaterial( {map : texture,color: 0xffffff } ); var geometry = new THREE.BoxGeometry(2,2,2); var obj = new THREE.Mesh(geometry,material); scene.add( obj ); }

custom-block.s: カメラの位置を %n %n %n にする
カメラの向きを %n %n %n （地点） に向ける
%s の色を RGB %n %n %n にする

block.l: //キャンバスをテクスチャとする例 var cvs = document.createElement('canvas'), ctx = cvs.getContext('2d'); //console.log(cvs); //document.body.appendChild(cvs); cvs.width = 256; cvs.height = 256; // クリップする円の位置と半径を指定する ctx.beginPath(); ctx.arc(175, 175, 175, 0, Math.PI*2, false); ctx.clip(); // 画像を用意する var img4 = new Image(); img4.src = "assets/textures/earth_atmos_2048.jpg"; img4.onload = function(){ ctx.drawImage(img4, 160, 0, 256, 256, 0, 0, 256, 256); ctx.beginPath(); ctx.rect(20, 40, 100, 100); ctx.fillStyle = "#FF0000"; ctx.fill(); ctx.closePath(); var texture = new THREE.Texture(cvs); texture.needsUpdate = true; var material = new THREE.SpriteMaterial( { map: texture, color: 0xffffff } ); var sprite = new THREE.Sprite( material ); sprite.scale.set(5, 5, 5); sprite.position.set(0, 0, 0); scene.add( sprite ); }

//キャンバスをテクスチャとする例3 var cvs = document.createElement('canvas'), ctx = cvs.getContext('2d'); cvs.width = 256; cvs.height = 256; ctx.beginPath(); ctx.rect(20, 40, 50, 50); ctx.fillStyle = "#FF0000"; ctx.fill(); ctx.closePath(); // Textureとして指定する．以下Three.jsでよくあるオブジェクト描画と同じ var texture = new THREE.Texture(cvs); texture.needsUpdate = true; var material = new THREE.MeshPhongMaterial( {map : texture ,color: 0xffffff } ); var geometry = new THREE.BoxGeometry(2,2,2); var obj = new THREE.Mesh(geometry,material); scene.add( obj );

container.addEventListener( 'mousemove', onMouseMove, false ); function onMouseMove( event ) { var rect = container.getBoundingClientRect(); x = event.clientX - rect.left; y = event.clientY - rect.top; console.log(x+","+y); }

var stage = this.parentThatIsA(StageMorph), context = stage.penTrails().getContext('2d'), rotation = radians(this.direction() - 90), trans = new Point( this.center().x - stage.left(), this.center().y - stage.top() ), isWarped = this.Warped, len, pos; if (isWarped) {endWarp(); } context.save(); context.font = size + 'px monospace'; context.textAlign = 'left'; context.textBaseline = 'alphabetic'; context.fillStyle = this.color.toString(); len = context.measureText(text).width; trans = trans.multiplyBy(1 / stage.scale); context.translate(trans.x, trans.y); context.rotate(rotation); context.fillText(text, 0, 0); context.translate(-trans.x, -trans.y); context.restore(); pos = new Point( len * Math.sin(radians(this.direction())), len * Math.cos(radians(this.direction()))); pos = pos.add(new Point(this.xPosition(), this.yPosition())); this.gotoXY(pos.x, pos.y, false); this.changed(); if (isWarped) {this.startWarp(); } stage.changed();

block.l: container.style.width = w +"px"; container.style.height =h +"px"; renderer.setSize(w,h); camera.aspect = w/h; camera.updateProjectionMatrix(); //ctx.translate(canvas.width / 2, canvas.height / 2); ctx.setTransform(1, 0, 0, 1, canvas.width / 2, canvas.height / 2);

custom-block.s: すべてをステージから削除する

inputs.input: ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー 照明の設定 カメラの設定 オブジェクトの設定

block-definition.s: カメラの位置を %'x' %'y' %'z' にする
カメラの向きを %'x' %'y' %'z' （地点） に向ける

custom-block.s: %s の向きを %s （地点） に向ける

block-definition.s: カメラの位置を %'x' %'y' %'z' ずつ変える

custom-block.s: %s の位置を %n %n %n ずつ変える

block-definition.s: カメラの向きを %'x' %'y' %'z' ずつ変える

custom-block.s: %s の向きを %s ずつ変える

block-definition.s: カメラを %'value' 歩前に進める

custom-block.s: %s の位置を %s ずつ変える （ローカル）
%s の位置を %s ずつ変える

block.l: var vec = new THREE.Vector3(); camera.getWorldDirection(v); camera.translateX(vec.x*d); camera.translateY(vec.y*d); camera.translateZ(vec.z*d);

block-definition.s: カメラの向きを %'vec' に向ける
照明（点光源） 強さ: %'val' % 距離: %'val2'

block.l: var light = new THREE.PointLight(0xffffff,val*0.01,val2,2); light.position.set(0, 0, 0).normalize(); light.castShadow = true; light.shadow.mapSize.width = 2048; light.shadow.mapSize.height = 2048; scene.add(light); return light;

var light = new THREE.DirectionalLight(0xffffff,val*0.01); light.position.set(0, 0, 0).normalize(); light.castShadow = true; light.shadow.mapSize.width = 4096; light.shadow.mapSize.height = 4096; light.shadow.camera.near = 1; light.shadow.camera.far = 200; light.shadow.camera.top = 100; light.shadow.camera.bottom = -100; light.shadow.camera.right = 100; light.shadow.camera.left = -100; scene.add(light); return light;

block-definition.s: 照明（環境） 強さ： %'強さ' %

block.l: var light = new THREE.AmbientLight(0xffffff); light.color.multiplyScalar(fac/100); scene.add(light); return light;

var light = new THREE.SpotLight(0xffffff); light.target.position.set(0,-1,0); light.position.set(0, 0, 0); light.castShadow = true; light.shadow.mapSize.width = 512; light.shadow.mapSize.height = 512; scene.add(light); return light;

block-definition.s: 形状（立方体） サイズ: %'x' %'y' %'z'

block.l: var geometry = new THREE.BoxGeometry( _x, _y, _z ); var material = new THREE.MeshLambertMaterial({ color: "#FFFFFF" }); var cube = new THREE.Mesh( geometry, material ); cube.castShadow = true; cube.receiveShadow = true; scene.add(cube); return cube;

var geometry = new THREE.SphereGeometry( r,32,32 ); var material = new THREE.MeshStandardMaterial({color :0xffffff}); //var material = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({color :0xffffff}); var obj = new THREE.Mesh( geometry, material ); obj.castShadow = true; //obj.receiveShadow = true; scene.add( obj ); return obj;

block-definition.s: 形状（トーラス） 半径： %'r' 太さ： %'t'

block.l: var geometry = new THREE.TorusGeometry( r, t, 16 ,32); var material = new THREE.MeshLambertMaterial({ color: "#ffffff" }); var obj = new THREE.Mesh( geometry, material ); obj.castShadow = true; obj.receiveShadow = true; scene.add( obj ); return obj;

isDone = false; colladaLoader.load(url,function(result){ dae = result.scene; dae.name = "collada"; console.log(dae); mesh = dae.children[1]; //mesh.castShadow = true; //mesh.receiveShadow = true; console.log(mesh); //scene.add(mesh); scene.add(dae); //console.log("end"); isDone = true; });

var material = new THREE.LineBasicMaterial({color: 0xffffff}); var line = new THREE.Line( geometry, material ); //line.verticesNeedUpdate = true; //line.elementNeedUpdate = true; scene.add( line ); return line;

var geometry = new THREE.Geometry(); for(i=0;i<65;i++){ geometry.vertices.push(new THREE.Vector3(r*Math.sin(i*3.14/32),0,r*Math.cos(i*3.14/32))); } var material = new THREE.LineBasicMaterial({color: 0xffffff}); var line = new THREE.Line( geometry, material ); //line.verticesNeedUpdate = true; //line.elementNeedUpdate = true; scene.add( line ); return line;

var geometry = new THREE.Geometry(); geometry.vertices.push( new THREE.Vector3(-d/2,0,-d/2), new THREE.Vector3(d/2,0,-d/2), new THREE.Vector3(d/2,0,d/2), new THREE.Vector3(-d/2,0,d/2), new THREE.Vector3(-d/2,0,-d/2) ); var material = new THREE.LineBasicMaterial({color: 0xffffff}); var line = new THREE.Line( geometry, material ); //line.verticesNeedUpdate = true; //line.elementNeedUpdate = true; scene.add( line ); return line;
return new THREE.Vector3( x, y, z );

block.l: //GridHelper(大きさ, １マスの大きさ) var grid = new THREE.GridHelper(_s, _p); //シーンオブジェクトに追加 scene.add(grid);
var obj2 = obj.clone(); scene.add(obj2); return obj2;

block-definition.s: カメラヘルパーを作る %'light'
ステージの %'n' 番目の要素を取得
%'obj' を グループ: %'group' に追加する
%'obj' を グループ: %'group' から削除する
%'obj' をステージに登録する

block.l: if(dir=="X"){return vec.x;}; if(dir=="Y"){return vec.y;}; if(dir=="Z"){return vec.z;}

block-definition.s: %'obj' をステージから削除する
すべてをステージから削除する

block.l: var obj; while(scene.children.length){ obj = scene.children[0] scene.remove(obj); } scene.add(camera); controls.reset();

block-definition.s: サイン波 速さ %'f' 値 %'A' ～ %'B'
コサイン波 速さ %'f' 値 %'A' ～ %'B'
%'obj' の色を RGB %'r' %'g' %'b' にする

block.l: var col = new THREE.Color(r/255,g/255,b/255); if(obj.isLight){ obj.color = col; }else{ obj.material.color = col; };

block-definition.s: %'obj' をワイヤーフレームにする／しない
%'obj' のテクスチャーを image: %'img' にする

block.l: var loader = new THREE.TextureLoader(); loader.load(img,function(texture){ obj.material.map = texture; console.log(texture); obj.material.needsUpdate = true; } );

block-definition.s: %'obj' のバンプマップを %'img' %'scale' にする

block.l: var loader = new THREE.TextureLoader(); loader.load(img,function(texture){ obj.material.bumpMap = texture; obj.material.bumpScale = scale*0.01; obj.material.needsUpdate = true; //console.log(obj.material); } )
var texture = new THREE.TextureLoader().load(img); obj.material.bumpMap = texture; obj.material.bumpScale = scale*0.01; obj.material.needsUpdate = true; //console.log(obj.material);
var texture = new THREE.TextureLoader().load(img); var mat = new THREE.MeshStandardMaterial( { bumpMap: texture, bumpScale:scale*0.01, roughness:1, } ); obj.material = mat;

block-definition.s: %'obj' をコンソール出力する
点光源ヘルパーを作る %'light'

block.l: var lightHelper = new THREE.PointLightHelper( light, 1);//(光源,ヘルパーオブジェクトの大きさ) scene.add(lightHelper);

block-definition.s: 平行光源ヘルパーを作る %'light'

block.l: var LightHelper = new THREE.DirectionalLightHelper( light, 1); scene.add( LightHelper);
var group = new THREE.Group(); scene.add(group); return group;

block-definition.s: raycaster: %'obj' から %'dir' 方向を調べる obj

block.l: raycaster.set(obj.position,dir.normalize()); const intersects = raycaster.intersectObjects(scene.children); if(intersects.length > 0){ // console.log(intersects); return intersects[0].object; }else{ return false; }

block-definition.s: raycaster: %'obj' から %'dir' 方向を調べる 距離
raycaster: %'obj' から %'dir' 方向を調べる 法線

block.l: raycaster.set(obj.position,dir.normalize()); const intersects = raycaster.intersectObjects(scene.children); if(intersects.length > 0){ //console.log(raycaster.intersectObject(intersects[0].object,true)[0].face.normal); return raycaster.intersectObject(intersects[0].object,true)[0].face.normal; }else{ return false; }

block-definition.s: raycaster: 2D画面内の %'x' %'y' を調べる

block.l: raycaster.setFromCamera(new THREE.Vector2(x,y), camera ); const intersects = raycaster.intersectObjects(scene.children); if(intersects.length > 0){ // ぶつかったオブジェクトに対してなんかする //console.log(intersects); return intersects[0].object; }else{ return false; }
var vec = new THREE.Vector3(); obj.getWorldPosition(vec); return vec;
var vec = new THREE.Vector3(); obj.getWorldDirection(vec); return vec;

block-definition.s: %'obj' の位置を %'vec' ずつ変える

block.l: obj.position.x = obj.position.x + vec.x; obj.position.y = obj.position.y + vec.y; obj.position.z = obj.position.z + vec.z; //obj.translateOnAxis(new THREE.Vector3(1,0,0), vec.x); //obj.translateOnAxis(new THREE.Vector3(0,1,0), vec.y); //obj.translateOnAxis(new THREE.Vector3(0,0,1), vec.z); //obj.translateX(vec.x); //obj.translateY(vec.y); //obj.translateZ(vec.z);
var vec1 = new THREE.Vector3(); var vec2 = new THREE.Vector3(0,1,0); obj.getWorldDirection(vec1); var vec3 = vec1.crossVectors(vec1,vec2); return vec3;
var vec1 = new THREE.Vector3(); var vec2 = new THREE.Vector3(0,1,0); obj.getWorldDirection(vec1); var vec3 = vec1.crossVectors(vec2,vec1); return vec3;
var vec = new THREE.Vector3(); return obj.up;

block-definition.s: %'obj' の向きを %'vec' （方向） に向ける

custom-block.s: %s の向きを %s （地点） に向ける

block-definition.s: %'obj' の向きを %'vec' （地点） に向ける
%'obj' の向きを %'vec' ずつ変える

block.l: var deg= Math.PI/180; obj.rotateX(vec.x*deg); obj.rotateY(vec.y*deg); obj.rotateZ(vec.z*deg);

input.options: source-over source-in source-out source-atop destination-over destination-in destination-out destination-atop lighter darken copy xor

block-definition.s: スプライト を整列させる
%'obj' のテクスチャ画像（陰なし）を %'img' にする

block.l: var loader = new THREE.TextureLoader(); loader.load(img,function(texture){ var mat = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({ color: 0xFFFFFF, map: texture, }); //console.log(mat); obj.material = mat; } );

block-definition.s: %'obj' が影を落とす/落とさない
%'obj' が影を受ける/受けない

block.l: var geometry = new THREE.SphereGeometry( r,32,32 ); var material = new THREE.MeshStandardMaterial({color :0xffffff}); //var material = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({color :0xffffff}); var obj = new THREE.Mesh( geometry, material ); obj.castShadow = true; obj.receiveShadow = true; scene.add( obj ); return obj;

block-definition.s: %'val' の小数点 %'fig' ケタにする
%'obj' の位置を %'vec' ずつ変える （ローカル）

block.l: //console.log(vec); //obj.position.x = obj.position.x + vec.x; //obj.position.y = obj.position.y + vec.y; //obj.position.z = obj.position.z + vec.z; //obj.translateOnAxis(new THREE.Vector3(1,0,0), vec.x); //obj.translateOnAxis(new THREE.Vector3(0,1,0), vec.y); //obj.translateOnAxis(new THREE.Vector3(0,0,1), vec.z); obj.translateX(vec.x); obj.translateY(vec.y); obj.translateZ(vec.z);

block-definition.s: %'obj' の位置を %'x' %'y' %'z' ずつ変える （ローカル）

custom-block.s: %s の位置を %s ずつ変える （ローカル）

block-definition.s: %'vec1' が %'vec2' で反射後の方向
%'obj' のテクスチャーを canvas: %'can' にする

block.l: var cvs = document.createElement('canvas'); cvs.width = w; cvs.height = h; return cvs;
